## eqDeltaS variable

Checks given strided vectors for componentwise equality, taking tolerance `eps` (default: [EPS](./math.eps.md)<!-- -->) into account.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
eqDeltaS: (a: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, b: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, n: number, eps?: number, ia?: number, ib?: number, sa?: number, sb?: number) => boolean
```
